website_summaries.verdict: A wine preserver pump that's suitable for those with arthritis or carpal tunnel syndrome.
pros: Handle is ergonomically designed with non-slip rubber
Doesn’t require a lot of pumps to get a good seal
Can preserve wine freshness for 4 or 5 days
Instruction video on the manufacturer’s product page is helpful
cons: Unlike a well-known competitor, pump doesn’t make a clicking sound to indicate when it’s finished

customer_reviews.title: Really annoying!  Need to clarify the listing to show what you are actually buying
customer_reviews.text: The listing was misleading due to wording ('Oxo Steel Vacuum Wine Saver & Preserver') and accompanying photo showing 3 items. I thought I was buying the Oxo wine preserver pump and 2 stoppers. I already own one pump and wanted to have a second one. I'm not going to bother to return these stoppers because I can use them...but had to go out and buy a second pump at a retail store; and that comes with 2 more stoppers...which I did not need.
customer_reviews.author: merchantlink

customer_reviews.title: This thing sucks, and not in a good way.
customer_reviews.text: This thing sucks, and not in a good way. I typically LOVE OXO products, I have many of them that are awesome. But this thing makes wine taste worse after even a day with a "vacuum seal". I gave it three different opportunities to prove itself. Lost on all 3 accounts. It's just past a month so I can't return it unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: These do the job. I use them for my wines and they help them last a lot longer than a simple cork. Only complaint is that the durability isn't that great and the pump tends to fail over time
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed Abdo

customer_reviews.title: Works better than others
customer_reviews.text: This works as advertised and takes fewer pumps then previous Vacuum Savers I've used [tho more than they say]. When you push the tab on the stopper you definitely hear the vacuum releasing.
customer_reviews.author: Mel H

customer_reviews.title: Great pump!
customer_reviews.text: Lost my other pumps from different vendor, but this one trumps them all. Works much better than the previous ones and keep my wine fresh!
customer_reviews.author: Shoo-shoo

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what you want it to. They seal in the air very well. We like to taste and open different wines for entertaining. Once everyone leaves we use these we put these on the wine and throw them in the wine fridge. No leaks and preserves the wine well.
customer_reviews.author: John Doughnut

customer_reviews.title: 75% of order held vacuum seal < 1min.
customer_reviews.text: Only one of the four in package holds vacuum. Three of them never held a seal for even a minute
customer_reviews.author: Rothmiin

customer_reviews.title: Break the air seal with the tab on top!
customer_reviews.text: One of the stoppers I owned got damaged and was no longer airtight. Probably my fault, since I didn't realize the tab on top was for breaking the vacuum seal. I was just pulling out the plug. Very happy that these replacement stoppers were available, and that I read the directions. It's much easier to open wine bottles now.
customer_reviews.author: J Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Defective. Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: One of the two corks is defective. The other one seems to be working. I tried with couple of wine bottles but ended up wasting them. So it’s a little disappointing. I tried to contact the Oxo customer service but No response for few days now. so I will give couple of more days to get the defective cork replaced or I would have to return the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: gave as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this item as a gift but have been told it performs exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Having used several air evacuators, this one is tops. I gave up on similar ones. The OXO uses soft rubber corks which, apparently, does a better job sealing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Prevents wine from spoiling for up to a month!
customer_reviews.text: Once a bottle of fine wine is opened, it's flavor will be ruined by the oxygen in the air in just a day or two. The OXO wine saver is the very best that I have used for creating a vacuum inside the wine bottle and (most important) holding that vacuum for 3-4 weeks, preserving the flavor for that entire time.
customer_reviews.author: J7Trees

customer_reviews.title: Like wine, you'll LOVE this!
customer_reviews.text: We love our OXO vacuum wine saver! It works really well and is so easy to use! I liked ours so much, I bought another for my sister. Perfect way to preserve a 1/2 bottle of wine!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Henz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, keeps open bottles fresh for long time...
customer_reviews.text: I never used wine savers before, so have nothing to compare with, but I'm pretty satisfied with the result. It definitely does better job on preserving open bottles than the cork. I live alone and love having a glass of wine with dinner, so it is definitely what I'd been looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: A reliable replacement to the original wine savers. Wine ...
customer_reviews.text: A reliable replacement to the original wine savers. Wine saver corks were modified several years ago, and frequently they didn't keep a vacuum. But OXO has created a reliable rubber stopper that seems to keep the vacuum intact
customer_reviews.author: WMT

customer_reviews.title: BestVaccum Wine Save on the Market
customer_reviews.text: Having tried multiple products of this type, I can say that the ease of use and effectiveness of this Wine Saver pump is vastly superior to competitors. This is a case where the price margin is worth it. OXO invested in engineering, not just marketing on this product
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this little thing! Keeps wine nice and fresh and super easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Ball

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are the best wine stoppers i’ve ever used. They do not leak.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Jo Spiering

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as a replacement for the one that accidentally landed in the garbage disposal. Works well. Wine lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: SFC

customer_reviews.title: Good price...great corks
customer_reviews.text: Good price for extra vacuum wine bottle corks...far better designed vacuum system than others i've used.
customer_reviews.author: Gizmo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. I use it on my vermouth and it helps extend the life of it.
customer_reviews.author: Chester Lau

customer_reviews.title: Awesome additional reusable corks.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have many open bottles of wine at any given time, and these things are absolutely required. They work great!
customer_reviews.author: Computer guy

customer_reviews.title: Keeps wine fresh better than just a cork
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised! Keeps wine fresh better than just a cork, easy to use. Shipped fst. WE are very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: UnkoBunk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works like it should, nothing bad to say about it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Would love to get more than two stoppers with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie D

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty neat device. Doesn’t stay air tight long. If you’re an every day drinker, then it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Nice high quality item and works perfectly as it should
customer_reviews.text: Nice high quality item and works perfectly as it should! Got 1 for me and 2 as presents and all were very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Alexei Karam

customer_reviews.title: Worked well but broke quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Kept the wine fresh as expected. But the plastic o-ring broke after 1 month. So is now unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Mumy

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I have very little experience with wine preservers, but when I suck the air out of the bottle I can see the large bubbles move up the bottle so it is sucking air out. Then taking the seal/cork out is very easy, just move the release valve and it comes right off. It seems to do a fine job. Since I don't have much to compare it to, I'm not comfortable giving it five stars, but it seems to work fine for our simple needs.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Jack

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wine lovers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to keep wine fresh. Has 2 toppers. Was a great gift idea for anyone who enjoys wine.
customer_reviews.author: Rita White

customer_reviews.title: These ones really work!
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum wine-bottle stoppers are an essential accessory for a wine lover who doesn't want to either waste a good bottle or drink the whole lot in one and get a nasty hangover. But not all wine stoppers are alike. For such a simple concept, so many brands have come up with unreliable, complex, or even disfunctional [that's you, Rabbit/Metrokane!]. They leak, the pump seizes up.... These OXO stoppers stay sealed for days, they have a neat pressure-release valve, and they work with the very robust OXO pump. I'm sure theere are other kits that work very well too. But I've bought OXO for my homes and for other wine-loving homes that I visit.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for one of my best friends for her bday
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for one of my best friends for her bday. She loved it and wow it works really well, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremia Miller

customer_reviews.title: It does the work to keep wine from one day ...
customer_reviews.text: It does the work to keep wine from one day to the following, but it won't work for more than one day.
customer_reviews.author: Lucía Sosa Dalmaud

customer_reviews.title: A little misleading...
customer_reviews.text: Beware, this order is only for the replacement corks. Does not include the pressure contraption. Alone, they are useless, they do not create a vaccum of any kind.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Item broke after several uses a piece of cork remained stuck inside.
customer_reviews.author: Ainy

customer_reviews.title: I may be doing it wrong but have wasted 3 bottles of great wine trying to make it ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. I have tried to get this to seal a bottle and it will not do it. In fairness to the company, I may be doing it wrong but have wasted 3 bottles of great wine trying to make it work. Moving on.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: ... piece of equipment is absolutely worthless & a total waste of our time & money
customer_reviews.text: This piece of equipment is absolutely worthless & a total waste of our time & money. I even bought an expensive electric 'Wine saver, & it was every bit as bad as this one is, & it cost 4 times the amount of money. DON"T BOTHER WITH THIS ONE!
customer_reviews.author: T.Herm

customer_reviews.title: Not Working, Lost An Expensive Wine From Bottle Leaking
customer_reviews.text: I used this yesterday for the first time. It didn't work at all. I sealed up my bottle of wine, put it on its side in the wine fridge, and a few hours later there was a wine puddle on the floor. Luckily my dog wasn't here or he would have liked it all. I tried again today, and it's not working. I used to have the oxo stopper/pourer but it broke, so I figured I'd try this. The only thing that may be a problem is that this is a sparkling wine.
customer_reviews.author: Sprtngirl

customer_reviews.title: Improper advertising
customer_reviews.text: Not the product advertised. Pictures on amazon do not match what you actually receive. The stoppers are not the same as what is in the box or website. No directions how to use. Also advertised with nice stainless steal look. It doesn’t have it. Box says satisfaction guaranteed. I will be returning ASAP. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsty Azzaro

customer_reviews.title: It's OXO - Nuff Said
customer_reviews.text: We are an OXO family. The OXO brand has been continually reliable with a record of long lasting durability. I haven't purchased an OXO product that I wasn't impressed with. This is no different. It serves it's purpose and looks nice. I actually look forward to drinking three day old wine now!
customer_reviews.author: michy

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased with this! Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have had several brands of vacuum wine bottle sealers. This unit is the best designed and easiest to use I have had. The stopper does a good job of sealing and is easy to vent with the gray knob. It is hard to go wrong with OXO.
customer_reviews.author: Ski Cat

customer_reviews.title: It preserves the wine much better than simply putting a cork back into the bottle
customer_reviews.text: OXO brand products are my go-to. We have used the Vacuum Wine Saver for years. It preserves the wine much better than simply putting a cork back into the bottle. This is perfect if you have 1-2 glasses at a time and want to preserve the bottle for another time.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: I can leave a bottle of wine in my refrigerator for 10 or 15 days and it stays perfect. I usually drink one glass of wine each time, so I open the bottle 6 or 7 times. Once I served the wine I close it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: NegroL

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, effective
customer_reviews.text: In my experience, this has made a noticeable difference in prolonging the life of wine once its been open. It definitely does a good job of maintaining its seal even for weeks. It is also very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: GatorGuy

customer_reviews.title: Finally found on Amazon and I'm very satisfied as it keeps my wines fresher as I use ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought a vacuum pump and two savers and was looking for more savers. Finally found on Amazon and I'm very satisfied as it keeps my wines fresher as I use mostly for cooking.
customer_reviews.author: FMT

customer_reviews.title: Usuallly work
customer_reviews.text: Convenient, easy to use. Usually work well, but on occasion I’ll notice that air has been let in overnight.
customer_reviews.author: VM120

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: They are a nice tight fit and work great with the pump I already had. Exactly as I hoped! I’ve had them for months now and still a nice tight vacuum seal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this little gadget
customer_reviews.text: Love this little gadget! I own one and bought for my mom and my brother as well for a stocking stuffer this year!
customer_reviews.author: NTH

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget is worth every penny. Works well and is very effective at preserving wine for about one week or so. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa W

customer_reviews.title: Works and Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: I like to enjoy a good glass of red wine while winding down, but it takes me about a week to get through a whole bottle, by which time it turns and I have to use it for cooking or salad dressing. This has worked like a charm for me and has preserved wine well for ~4 days before there's a noticeable change in taste (though the wine remains drinkable for a couple days more). The pump is smaller than I expected, which is also nice for storage. The overall look and functionality of it are definitely 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: WMK

customer_reviews.title: These are the FIRST stoppers we have used that actually ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the FIRST stoppers we have used that actually hold a vacuum. We have left bottles for more that 10 days and they were still holding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... is the first wine saver that we have been pleased with. All the others we've tried simply didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first wine saver that we have been pleased with. All the others we've tried simply didn't hold a vacuum. These do! So far they have held more than 10 days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the solution that I've been looking for to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the solution that I've been looking for to keep my red wine from turning. Works exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Mike46

customer_reviews.title: My husband's favorite pump wine preserver!
customer_reviews.text: First, I will admit that I have not purchased an OXO product I do not like. This was a gift for my husband and he said it is the best pump wine preserver he has used, and he has several. When this one wears out, I will purchase another OXO wine preserver.
customer_reviews.author: mimiofmany

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for people who don't finish entire bottles of ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for people who don't finish entire bottles of wine. Its very simple to use, aesthetically pleasing, and fast. Keeps the wine fresher than just trying to shove the cork back in!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: not really does much... expected more from ...
customer_reviews.text: not really does much ... expected more from an oxo product...

product_meta.title: OXO SteeL Vacuum Wine Saver and Preserver with Two Stoppers,Silver
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Wine SaverThe OXO Steel Vacuum Wine Pump keeps your wine fresh longer than a traditional cork. The Pump easily extracts air from the bottle, slowing down the oxidation process that can flatten the taste of wine. The easy-to-hold, contoured neck prevents pinching while you're pumping and the soft, comfortable grips are non-slip. With just a few easy pumps, the Stoppers form a vacuum seal that preserves wine's flavors and aromas until you're ready for another glass.

BRAND STORY
By
feature_bullets: Keeps wine fresh longer than cork alone
Pump extracts air from bottle to preserve wine's flavor
Easy-to-hold, contoured neck prevents pinching while pumping
Push tab on Stopper to release vacuum seal for easy removal
Stopper forms a seal to keep wine fresh longer than cork

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
